SynBioinformatica
=======================

About
-----
- Description: Command line interface for computable molecular / synthetic biology construction files
- Authors: Nima Emami (nemami) and Tim Hsiau (hsiaut)
- Contributors: Kelvin Li (KelvinLi), Michael Lin Yang (michaellin)
- Documentation: in progress

Use
---
- Example PCR invocation:
<br>template_Plasmid = DNA('plasmid','pBad/Myc-HisA GFP',"") 
<br># Primers to add NdeI / BamHI sites to insert
<br>primer_1 = DNA('primer','sbi001','aggtgccaCATATGtctaaaggtgaagaattattcactg') 
<br>primer_2 = DNA('primer','sbi002','tggagaccGGATCCgtttaaacTCAtttgtacaattcatccataccatgg')
<br># Nicely print shorter sequences of DNA...
<br>insert_Amplification = PCR(primer_1, primer_2, template_Plasmid)
<br>insert_Amplification.prettyPrint()

Contributing
--------------------------------
- All contributions and bug reports are much appreciated
